title: What were the best dialogues and scenes from 'Scam 1992' (2020 web series) by Sony Liv? - Quora

response.answer_text: All 500+ Best The Harshad Mehta Story - Scam 1992 Dialogues are below…Abhi apne pass kharch karne ko sirf time hi to hai,nahi to sahi time ka wait karne me khud kharch ho jayenge… Ek baat yaad rakhna ye america ka wall street nahi hai,Bombay ka dalaal street hai, aur ye satta bazar,yahan par bear niche mare ya bull upar,jab lagti hai to aadmi zameen par hi girta hai… Gujarati ke liye dhanda dharam se bhi bada hota hai… Market me Sabse bada jokhim,jokhim na lene mein hai.. Locha lafda aur Jalebi fafdaise gujarati ki life se koi nikaal nahi sakta… Risk hai to Ishq hai… Ab meri tarah Risk se ishq hai to kood pado,ya to duboge ya udoge… Success kya hai,Failure ke baad ka naya chapter… Pranav bhai mujhe papad belna hi nahi hai,seedha tal ke khana hai wo bhi kanda tamatar ke sath…. Jab Jeb me Money ho na,toh kundli me shani hone se fark nahi padta…. ————————————For More—————————————

Have you watched Scam 1992 web series on SonyLIV? If Yes then it’s a good choice but if you said no then you really gonna miss something interesting. Scam 1992- The Harshad Mehta Story is a SonyLIV drama web-series directed by Hansal Mehta. The series based on a 1992 Indian stock market scam committed by stockbroker Harshad Mehta in 1992. Scam 1992 web series is adapted from journalist Sucheta Dalal and Debashish Basu’s book “The Scam: Who Won, who Lost, who Got Away“.  The series features Pratik Gandhi, Sharib Hashmi, Shreya Dhanwanthary, Hemant Kher, and Nikhil Dwivedi. This series has become quite popular among the people due to a good story, good performance, and some sharp dialogues. So, Here you can read and watch some of the Best Dialogues From ‘Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story’          So, Which one is your favorite dialogue from our Best Dialogues From ‘Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story’?
